Title: NLNG says gas supply unaffected by explosion at gas processing plant
Description: Nigeria LNG (NLNG), which operates the 22.14 mtpa Bonny LNG plant, said that the explosion at a Shell-operated gas processing plant did not affect gas supplies to the plant.
Author: JS

Title: FERC delays issue of environmental assessment to Cheniere’s Corpus Christi expansion
Description: The Federal Energy Regulatory Commission (FERC) said that it will postpone the environmental assessment (EA) and permit issue of the midscale Train 8 and 9 expansion at Cheniere’s Corpus Christi LNG plant in Texas by three months.
Author: JS

Title: Dragon LNG to offer regasification capacity from September 2029
Description: The operator of the UK's 5.6 mtpa Dragon LNG terminal is inviting expressions of interest for all of its regasification capacity available from September 2029.
Author: JS

Title: India’s Gail signs 14-yr LNG ship charter deal with CoolCo starting in 2025
Description:
India’s state-owned gas distributor Gail has signed a 14-year time charter party agreement with LNG shipowner CoolCo for a new-build LNG carrier. The charter will start in early 2025, with
CoolCo delivering the ship to Gail in the Gulf of Mexico.
Author: CK
